titleStmt.title: Loving reader, God Almighty hath not created, Man for himself, neither for his own ends, but hath given him natural affection for to love his fellowes, and loving them, to cure them by all means ...
titleStmt.author: Heusde, Sarah Cornelius de.

notesStmt.note: Title from first lines of text.
At end of text: To be delivered in hands of civil gentlewomen and maidens.
Imperfect: faded, with some loss of text.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
